SELECT ckso.service_order_number AS serviceOrderNumber, cksoa.member_name AS memberName, cksoa.member_telephone AS memberTelephone, cksoa.member_address AS memberAddress, cksod.service_cycle AS serviceCycle, cksod.service_num AS serviceNum, ckso.status AS status, ckso.price AS receivableMoney, IFNULL(a.all_box_count, 0)AS allBoxCount, IFNULL(b.has_send_box_, 0)AS hasSendBoxCount, cksod.discount_money AS discountMoney, (ckso.price+cksod.discount_money) AS orderMoney, ((ckso.price+cksod.discount_money)/a.all_box_count) AS boxMoney, date_format(ckso.create_time ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS showTime FROM cb_kuaidan_service_order ckso LEFT JOIN cb_kuaidan_service_order_address cksoa ON ckso.address_id=cksoa.id AND cksoa.del_flag="0" LEFT JOIN cb_kuaidan_service_order_discount cksod ON cksod.service_order_id=ckso.id AND cksod.del_flag="0" LEFT JOIN (SELECT service_order_id, COUNT(0) AS all_box_count FROM cb_kuaidan_box_order WHERE del_flag="0" GROUP BY service_order_id) AS a ON a.service_order_id=ckso.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT service_order_id, COUNT(0) AS has_send_box_ FROM cb_kuaidan_box_order WHERE del_flag="0" and status="1" GROUP BY service_order_id) AS b ON b.service_order_id=ckso.id WHERE ckso.id=#{id} AND ckso.del_flag="0"

SELECT ckso.id AS id, ckso.service_order_number AS serviceOrderNumber, cksoa.member_telephone AS memberTelephone, ckso.price AS price, ckso.status AS status, date_format(ckso.create_time ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS showTime, IFNULL(a.all_box_count, 0)AS allBoxCount, IFNULL(b.has_send_box_, 0)AS hasSendBoxCount, IFNULL(c.no_send_box_count, 0)AS noSendBoxCount FROM cb_kuaidan_service_order ckso LEFT JOIN cb_kuaidan_service_order_address cksoa ON ckso.address_id=cksoa.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT service_order_id, COUNT(0) AS all_box_count FROM cb_kuaidan_box_order WHERE del_flag="0" GROUP BY service_order_id) AS a ON a.service_order_id=ckso.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT service_order_id, COUNT(0) AS has_send_box_ FROM cb_kuaidan_box_order WHERE del_flag="0" and status="1" GROUP BY service_order_id) AS b ON b.service_order_id=ckso.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT service_order_id, COUNT(0) AS no_send_box_count FROM cb_kuaidan_box_order WHERE del_flag="0" and status="0" GROUP BY service_order_id) AS c ON c.service_order_id=ckso.id
